menu_simple_compass_reset_confirm: Are you sure, you want to reset all SimpleCompass options to their default value?
menu_simple_compass_teammate_visible_des: Show dots for teammates on the compass
menu_simple_compass_numbers_visible_desc: Show numerical indicators on the compass
menu_simple_compass_letters_visible_desc: Show main directional indicators on the compass, eg. N, E, S, W (REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_letters_secondary_vi: Show secondary directional indicators on the compass, eg. NE, SE, SW, NW (REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_team_indicator_width: Width of teammate indicators (REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_scale_desc: Scale of the compass, 1 = 100% (REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_alpha_desc: Opaqueness of the compass, 0 = Non-Opaque, 1 = Opaque
menu_simple_compass_objectives_color_des: (REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_objectives_indicator: (REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_objectives_visible_d: (REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_objectives_icons_des: Shows Objectives as Icons on the compass instead of dots(REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_teammate_icon_desc: Uses nationality icons instead of dots (REQUIRES RESTART OF CURRENT LEVEL TO APPLY!)
menu_simple_compass_curve_compass_desc: Curve Compass upwards towards the sides
